sceneries.name: Clashy Constructs Scenery
sceneries.description: The first custom village scenery, featuring a mechanical and wooden construction theme.

sceneries.name: Pirate Scenery
sceneries.description: A tropical pirate hideout with shipwrecked vessels and palm trees.

sceneries.name: Epic Winter Scenery
sceneries.description: A festive, snow-covered village with holiday decorations and lights.

sceneries.name: Hog Mountain Scenery
sceneries.description: A mountain-top scenery set above the clouds with rocky peaks.

sceneries.name: Jungle Scenery
sceneries.description: A lush, dense jungle theme unlocked upon reaching Town Hall 14.

sceneries.name: Epic Jungle Scenery
sceneries.description: An elaborate jungle city featuring ancient stone ruins and waterfalls.

sceneries.name: Inferno War Base Scenery
sceneries.description: A fiery lava-themed scenery designed exclusively for the War Base layout.

sceneries.name: 9th Clashiversary Scenery
sceneries.description: A futuristic party landscape celebrating the game's 9th anniversary.

sceneries.name: Pumpkin Graveyard
sceneries.description: A spooky Halloween graveyard with pumpkin patches and fog.

sceneries.name: Snow Day
sceneries.description: A quiet, snow-filled winter village aesthetic.

sceneries.name: Tiger Mountain
sceneries.description: A Lunar New Year scenery featuring tiger statues and floating lanterns.

sceneries.name: Primal Scenery
sceneries.description: A prehistoric landscape with massive skeletons and primitive plants.

sceneries.name: Shadow Scenery
sceneries.description: A dark, mystical scenery with floating islands and purple crystals.

sceneries.name: Royale Scenery
sceneries.description: A crossover scenery inspired by the arena design of Clash Royale.

sceneries.name: Summer Scenery
sceneries.description: A relaxing summer beach resort with clear blue water.

sceneries.name: Pixel Scenery
sceneries.description: A retro 8-bit aesthetic celebrating the 10th anniversary; originally a free event reward.

sceneries.name: 10th Clashiversary Scenery
sceneries.description: A grand celebration scenery showcasing highlights from the first decade of Clash.

sceneries.name: Clash Fest Scenery
sceneries.description: A festival-themed scenery with event tents and gaming monitors.

sceneries.name: Magic Scenery
sceneries.description: A mystical purple-themed forest unlocked upon reaching Town Hall 15.

sceneries.name: Epic Magic Scenery
sceneries.description: A magical forest environment with enchanted glowing crystals.

sceneries.name: Spooky Scenery
sceneries.description: A haunted forest scenery released for the 2022 Halloween season.

sceneries.name: Jolly Scenery
sceneries.description: A cheerful, snow-covered holiday village for Clashmas 2022.

sceneries.name: Magic Theatre Scenery
sceneries.description: A shadow-theatre style scenery for the 2023 Lunar New Year.

sceneries.name: Painter Scenery
sceneries.description: A colorful artistic canvas theme originally part of the Gold Pass.

sceneries.name: Dark Ages Scenery
sceneries.description: A medieval fortress scenery with dark, heavy stone architecture.

sceneries.name: Books of Clash Scenery
sceneries.description: A scenery inspired by the 'Books of Clash' graphic novels.

sceneries.name: War Arena Scenery
sceneries.description: A massive gladiator arena designed for War Bases.

sceneries.name: Goblin Caves Scenery
sceneries.description: A subterranean scenery featuring goblin caves and gold-filled mines.

sceneries.name: Future Scenery
sceneries.description: A futuristic city with high-tech buildings and holographic displays.

sceneries.name: Chess Scenery
sceneries.description: A strategy-themed landscape designed as a giant chessboard.

sceneries.name: Crystal Caverns Scenery
sceneries.description: An underground cavern system filled with glowing crystals.

sceneries.name: Ghost Scenery
sceneries.description: A spectral Halloween theme featuring ghosts and a phantom atmosphere.

sceneries.name: Champion Scenery
sceneries.description: A grand arena built for the Clash of Clans World Championships.

sceneries.name: Gingerbread Scenery
sceneries.description: A candy-filled scenery made of gingerbread and icing for the holidays.

sceneries.name: Of the North Scenery
sceneries.description: A rugged northern landscape with snowy pine forests.

sceneries.name: Dragon Palace Scenery
sceneries.description: A majestic dragon palace for the Year of the Dragon.

sceneries.name: Space Scenery
sceneries.description: A village set in space on an asteroid with orbiting planets.

sceneries.name: Egypt Scenery
sceneries.description: An ancient Egyptian scenery with pyramids and golden sand dunes.

sceneries.name: Football Scenery
sceneries.description: A sports-themed scenery featuring a massive football stadium.

sceneries.name: Wild West Scenery
sceneries.description: A dusty Wild West frontier town with saloons and cacti.

sceneries.name: Clash Games Stadium
sceneries.description: An athletic stadium scenery released for the summer sports season.

sceneries.name: Anime Scenery
sceneries.description: A hand-drawn anime aesthetic with cel-shaded village elements.

sceneries.name: Clash of Dragons
sceneries.description: A massive 'XL' Legendary scenery with interactive hero animations.

sceneries.name: Doomed Scenery
sceneries.description: A dark, doomed graveyard theme for the 2024 Clashoween event.

sceneries.name: Justice Scenery
sceneries.description: A heroic and noble scenery released for the Town Hall 17 update.

sceneries.name: War Machine Scenery
sceneries.description: A mechanical war base scenery featuring a giant rolling tank.

sceneries.name: Crossover Scenery
sceneries.description: A special crossover landscape for Supercell ID users.

sceneries.name: Toy Workshop Scenery
sceneries.description: A festive toy-factory workshop for the Clashmas 2024 season.

sceneries.name: Fire and Ice Scenery
sceneries.description: A contrasting realm split between lava flows and arctic ice.

sceneries.name: Year of the Snake
sceneries.description: An XL-sized Legendary scenery celebrating the 2025 Year of the Snake.

sceneries.name: Military Scenery
sceneries.description: A tactical military base scenery with barracks and airfield elements.

sceneries.name: ClashaMania Scenery
sceneries.description: A wrestling-themed arena with stadium seating and bright lights.

sceneries.name: High Seas Scenery
sceneries.description: A Japanese nautical theme featuring feudal-era ships and sea waves.

sceneries.name: Dark Days Scenery
sceneries.description: A rain-soaked cyberpunk city scenery with urban details.

sceneries.name: Cyber Scenery
sceneries.description: A neon-lit futuristic city with high-tech buildings and hovering cars.

sceneries.name: Clash-A-Rama Scenery
sceneries.description: A cell-shaded scenery based on the official Clash-A-Rama animation series.

sceneries.name: 13th Clash-A-Versary Scenery
sceneries.description: A celebratory landscape honoring 13 years of Clash of Clans.

sceneries.name: Mash-A-Rama Scenery
sceneries.description: A subterranean mashup scenery combining multiple game themes.

sceneries.name: Cosmic Scenery
sceneries.description: A large-scale astral space scenery with cosmic visual effects.

sceneries.name: Ruined Kingdom War Scenery
sceneries.description: A devastated kingdom war scenery released for the 2025 season.

sceneries.name: Wasteland Scenery
sceneries.description: An XL Legendary scenery featuring post-apocalyptic wasteland terrain.

sceneries.name: Frostage Scenery
sceneries.description: A massive winter-themed Legendary scenery with blizzard effects.
